name: Finding Your Path 2.0
description:
Your name in lights!

Help us slay bugs in our game and end up in the credits!

We're looking for a few brave beta testers to try our game aimed at high school kids interested in health science careers. If you can report actionable bugs, we'll include your name in the credits. If you can report  10 or more actionable bugs, we'll name an NPC in the game after you!
